oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Sowie ich den Erdgeruch von Proletariern spüre ...": Politische Ideengeschichte als Erfahrungsgeschichte
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Morina, Christina
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Biographik
Erfahrungsgeschichte
Arbeiterbewegung
Individuum
Gesellschaft
Biography Research
Labour Movement
Individual
Society
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The article outlines an on-going research project that aims to reconstruct the experiences that leading Marxist social democratic theorists made in the 19th and 20th century, when they tried to put "scientific socialism" into practice. It specifically discusses the challenges regarding the content, theory and methodology of the research project and it ponders its use of sources and development for hypotheses.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Moving the Social; Vol. 45 (2011): Biografische Ansätze zur Geschichte der Arbeiterbewegung im 20. Jahrhundert; 73-88
